item.content:encoded:
Patch release for Home Assistant 2023.2 compatibility

No new features just yet, only a hotfix for compatibility with HA 2023.2.x

A new version of Music Assistant is in the making and is (still) a bit delayed due to both personal reasons and the fact its a bit more work than expected. We will provide a beta very soon, stay tuned on discord for info!

Thanks!

https://github.com/music-assistant/hass-music-assistant/releases
